title: Bitcoin sits at range high as realized price sparks BTC 'macro signal'
description: Interesting signals are being printed by several more chart indicators this week, all of which have proven to be bear market bottom markers.
author: Cointelegraph By  William Suberg

title: ATOM price is reaching for the Cosmos, but why?
description: Like all altcoins, ATOM price fell as $550 million of BTC, ETH and altcoin positions were liquidated last week, which is exactly why its 35% rebound is raising eyebrows.
author: Cointelegraph By Ray Salmond

title: Why $20.8K is a critical level for Bitcoin | Find out now on Market Talks with Charlie Burton
description: What is the critical support level for Bitcoin and what happens if the market drops below it? Join us as we discuss this and other topics with Tim Warren, co-host of Coffee N Crypto, and Charlie Burton.
author: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph

title: Wen moon? Probably not soon: Why Bitcoin traders should make friends with the trend
description: Recurring bear flags and the Fed’s telegraphed monetary policy are painting a roadmap for BTC’s future price action.
author: Cointelegraph By Ray Salmond

title: Don’t trust your coins to anyone, Ledger CEO warns
description: The Ledger CEO said that until people begin using decentralized technology, control over assets and data will remain in the hands of the big tech giants and centralized intermediaries.
author: Cointelegraph By   Brayden Lindrea

title: Cardano hard fork ‘ever closer’ as upgraded SPOs account for 42% of blocks
description: IOHK wants to see at least 75% of new blocks coming from upgraded nodes, along with two other "critical indicators" before implementing the Vasil hard fork.
author: Cointelegraph By  Luke Huigsloot

title: Lower costs, higher speeds after Ethereum’s Merge? Don’t count on it
description: There’s a lot of hype surrounding Ethereum’s Merge. But in reality, most users aren’t going to notice much change.
author: Cointelegraph By Svyatoslav Dorofeev

title: Polygon founder Sandeep Nailwal raises $50M for Web3 fund
description: Symbolic Capital has become the latest venture firm to focus heavily on Web3, gaming and NFTs.
author: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi

title: 3 reasons why Binance Chain (BNB) rallied 66% since the crypto market crashed
description: BNB token holds a $50 billion market cap and has rallied 66% since the crypto market crashed, but what is behind the altcoin’s tremendous recovery?
author: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman

title: Prince Philip of Serbia suggests bringing Bitcoin into the classroom
description: The prince, jokingly implying he was rebuilding amid a bear market, constructed a sandcastle on the beach at the Surfin’ Bitcoin 2022 before it was unceremoniously stepped on.
author: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright

title: Crypto ATM firm Bitcoin Depot aims to go public in 2023 via $885M SPAC deal
description: One of the largest crypto ATM providers in North America, Bitcoin Depot, plans to list its stock on Nasdaq in the first quarter of 2023.
author: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz

title: Coinbase eyes long-term growth of subscription revenue, NFTs still a focus
description: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong says the exchange has been building subscription revenue streams for three years and will continue to do so into the long term.
author: Cointelegraph By   Gareth Jenkinson

title: How blockchain technology is changing the way people invest
description: Blockchain technology has changed the way modern people invest in assets, attracting younger and less affluent investors into the space.
author: Cointelegraph By Anthony Clarke

title: Eminem and Snoop Dogg to perform Bored Apes track at MTV music awards
description: BAYC members Eminem and Snoop Dogg will perform “From the D 2 the LBC” on an Otherside metaverse transformed stage.
author: Cointelegraph By  Luke Huigsloot

title: Bitcoin price taps $21.3K ahead of Fed Chair Powell Jackson Hole speech
description: Daily lows greet Bitcoin traders as markets await fresh macro cues from the Fed.
author: Cointelegraph By  William Suberg

title: Synthetix looks to turn off the SNX money printer once and for all
description: If the proposal were to take effect, Synthetix would much more closely resemble a traditional business by simply generating fee revenue and distributing the proceeds to SNX holders.
author: Cointelegraph By   Brayden Lindrea

title: Japan considers implementing tax reforms to prevent capital flight of crypto startups
description: Industry experts say that the current scheme is stifling domestic innovation in the virtual currency sector.
author: Cointelegraph By  Zhiyuan Sun

title: Alameda Research and FTX merge VC operations: Report
description: Alameda's investment arm, FTX Ventures, and crypto exchange FTX will reportedly continue to operate independently from each other.
author: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright

title: Afghan police close down cryptocurrency exchanges to enforce central bank ban: Report
description: The Afghan central bank declared forex trading un-Islamic and illegal earlier this year, and issued a warning about continuing activities a month later; now arrests have been made.
author: Cointelegraph By   Derek Andersen

title: Coinbase, whose CEO called most politics a 'distraction', launches voter registration tool
description: Faryar Shirzad said staying engaged and informed was critical, given candidates who win in the 2022 U.S. midterms “will be making key decisions" around crypto regulation.
author: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
